verbs.description: requeen (third-person singular simple present requeens, present participle requeening, simple past and past participle requeened)

entries.meaning: (beekeeping) To change or replace the queen bee of a colony of bees.
examples: Requeening means changing the queen of a colony, either to secure better stock, or to replace a queen which...cannot furnish the eggs necessary to the development of a normal colony.
